hero_description: Trade outcomes privately. No frontruns. No copycats. Only pure conviction. Built on BNB Smart Chain.
darkpool_explanation:
Darkpool Markets let you place bets privately inside hidden liquidity pools.
Every trade stays invisible, but outcomes settle transparently on BNB Smart Chain.
You see the truth only when it matters, when the market closes

markets.try_adjusting_filters: Try adjusting your filters or create the first prediction!

create_prediction.title: Create Prediction Market
create_prediction.description: Create a prediction market with automated or manual resolution
create_prediction.connect_wallet_to_create: Connect your wallet to create predictions
create_prediction.describe_prediction: Describe your prediction. AI will auto-generate the bet title.
create_prediction.prevent_spam: To prevent spam, creators must participate in their own prediction
create_prediction.click_create_will_prompt: Clicking "Create Bet" will prompt your wallet to send {amount} to the vault
create_prediction.set_expiration_help: Set when this prediction market will close and be resolved (minimum 15 minutes)
create_prediction.generate_analysis_checkbox: Generate detailed analysis (unbiased summary for card)

crypto_prediction.title: Crypto Prediction
crypto_prediction.choose_crypto_placeholder: Choose a cryptocurrency to predict about

event_prediction.title: Create Event Prediction
event_prediction.description: Predict real-world events in politics, technology, sports, and more. We monitor global news sources and automatically resolve when events are confirmed.
event_prediction.event_title_placeholder: e.g., Will SpaceX successfully launch Starship to orbit in 2025?
event_prediction.description_placeholder: Provide details about the event and what would constitute a YES or NO outcome...
event_prediction.how_it_works_desc: Your event will be monitored using trusted and reliable APIs. When reputable news sources confirm the event outcome with high confidence, the market will be automatically resolved and payouts distributed.

my_bets.title: My Bets
my_bets.subtitle: Track your prediction market investments and winnings
my_bets.no_active_bets: You don't have any active bets.
my_bets.no_resolved_bets: You don't have any resolved bets.
my_bets.no_bets_yet: You haven't placed any bets yet. Start by exploring the prediction markets!

how_it_works.title: How Darkbet Works
how_it_works.subheader: Darkbet turns every prediction market into a private, on-chain darkpool where bets stay hidden until resolution
how_it_works.platform_description: The infrastructure powering private predictions, intelligent oracles, and trustless market resolution
how_it_works.darkpool_description: Private liquidity pools where all positions remain hidden, eliminating frontrunning and manipulation
how_it_works.ai_oracles_description: Aggregates real-world data using AI to verify outcomes accurately and autonomously
how_it_works.on_chain_settlements_description: Markets resolve transparently on-chain, with trustless payouts based on verified results
how_it_works.real_time_description: Live activity feed and instant updates when bets are created, joined, or resolved
how_it_works.dark_pools_description: Private liquidity pools where all positions remain hidden until resolution, eliminating frontrunning and manipulation.
how_it_works.zk-encrypted_privacy_description: All bets are secured using zero-knowledge encryption, keeping amounts and identities private while still proving correctness on-chain
how_it_works.signal_integrity_description: Hidden liquidity preserves genuine market signals, preventing frontrunning, sentiment bias, and strategy imitation
how_it_works.trutless_resolution_description: Once the oracle verifies results, smart contracts settle markets automatically with verifiable, on-chain proofs
how_it_works.traditional_markets_points: Public bets and liquidity|Susceptible to manipulation|Copy trading and whale influence|Manual or biased resolution
how_it_works.darkbet_dark_pools_points: zk-encrypted private positions|Preserved market integrity|Automated, verifiable settlement|Fair, bias-free outcomes
how_it_works.creating_predictions_description: Simply describe what you want to bet on, AI will handle the rest
how_it_works.step1_description: just describe, and AI does the rest
how_it_works.step2_description: Darkbet's AI analyzes your description and generates a concise, searchable market title optimized for clarity, accuracy, and discoverability
how_it_works.step3_description: AI automatically sets intelligent deadlines and assigns the most relevant category, ensuring your market is structured and ready to launch instantly
how_it_works.dynamic_pricing_description: Darkbet uses a Fixed Product Market Maker (FPMM) for fair, dynamic pricing
how_it_works.price_mechanism_1: Prices determined by pool balance ratios
how_it_works.price_mechanism_2: YES price + NO price = 0.01 BNB always
how_it_works.price_mechanism_3: More bets on one side = higher price for that outcome
how_it_works.price_mechanism_4: Each bet shifts the market slightly
how_it_works.betting_default: Default: Buy 1 share at current market price
how_it_works.betting_custom: Custom: Enter any BNB amount, get calculated shares
how_it_works.pricing_example: If YES is trading at 0.006 BNB and you bet 0.01 BNB, you'll receive ~1.67 shares. If YES wins, each share pays 0.01 BNB (total: 0.0167 BNB payout).
how_it_works.ai_resolution_description: When bets expire, our multi-layer verification system automatically determines the outcome
how_it_works.layer1_description: Price oracles and on-chain data provide instant, verifiable results for crypto/token bets
how_it_works.layer2_description: Category-specific APIs fetch real data: weather data for weather bets, sports scores for sports bets, news for political events
how_it_works.layer3_description: Advanced AI analyzes gathered evidence and makes final determination with reasoning
how_it_works.verification_description: We use industry-leading APIs for verification (sources masked for security):
how_it_works.claiming_description: Winners split the total pool proportionally with automatic fee deduction
how_it_works.payout_mechanism_1: Winners split the total pool proportionally
how_it_works.payout_mechanism_2: Payout = (Your Shares ÷ Total Winning Shares) × Total Pool
how_it_works.payout_mechanism_4: You receive 98.5% of gross winnings in BNB
how_it_works.security_vault: Secure vault wallet holds all funds
how_it_works.security_bscscan: View transaction on BSCScan after claiming
how_it_works.fee_description: 1.5% platform fee applies to both prize claims AND bet cancellations
how_it_works.creator_description: To ensure quality predictions and prevent spam, creators must actively participate
how_it_works.mandatory_stake_description: Creators must bet on their own prediction when creating a market. This prevents spam and ensures creators have confidence in their predictions.
how_it_works.cancellation_description: If you're the only participant in your bet, you can cancel it and receive a refund:
how_it_works.cancellation_1: Only available when creator is sole participant
how_it_works.cancellation_3: Instant refund sent to your wallet
how_it_works.cancellation_4: Cancel button disappears once another user joins
how_it_works.automated_description: All bets resolve automatically - no manual intervention required
how_it_works.automated_1: AI analyzes evidence from 25+ verification APIs
how_it_works.automated_2: Price oracles provide instant crypto/token results
how_it_works.automated_4: Winners claim prizes manually (1.5% fee applies)
how_it_works.blockchain_1: All transactions on BNB Smart Chain
how_it_works.api_keys_masked: All API keys and sensitive data are masked
how_it_works.api_keys_description: We never expose internal credentials, vault wallet addresses, or verification source endpoints to protect platform integrity.
how_it_works.ready_description: Connect your wallet and create your first prediction market today

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.subtitle: Top performers on DarkBet prediction markets
leaderboard.working_on_features: We're working on adding more detailed analytics, historical data, and advanced filtering options.

errors.wallet_required: Please connect your wallet to place a bet

overview.title: DarkBet Documentation
overview.description: DarkBet is an on-chain prediction market built on BNB Chain, designed to allow users to forecast real-world events, market trends, and community-driven outcomes using blockchain technology. Every prediction, transaction, and resolution is executed on-chain, ensuring verifiable transparency and fairness.
overview.subdescription: Currently focused on crypto price movements for v1, DarkBet turns market sentiment and data analysis into actionable, tradeable predictions, creating a decentralized marketplace for crypto knowledge and foresight with the revolutionary Dark Pool betting system.

features.title: Key Features
features.privacy: Dark Pool Privacy - Bets remain hidden until resolution
features.blockchain: Fully On-Chain - Built on BNB Smart Chain
features.amm: Dynamic AMM Pricing - Fair market-based pricing

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.step1_desc: Connect using MetaMask, WalletConnect, or other supported wallets
getting_started.step2_desc: Describe your prediction or browse existing markets
getting_started.step3_desc: Automated resolution and manual claiming process

dark_pool.title: What is Dark Pool Betting?
dark_pool.description: Dark Pool betting combines the privacy and efficiency of traditional dark pools with prediction markets. Your bets remain completely hidden until the market resolves, preventing market manipulation and ensuring a fair, competitive environment for all participants.

benefits.privacy_desc: Your betting strategy remains completely hidden from other participants
benefits.fairness_desc: No first-mover advantage or copy trading

ready.title: Ready to Start?
ready.description: Explore our documentation to learn more about DarkBet and start your prediction market journey.

vision.title: DarkBet Vision
vision.description: DarkBet imagines a tomorrow where confidential forecasting platforms transform our engagement with cryptocurrency markets. An ecosystem prioritizing secrecy where DarkPool innovation creates honest, interference-resistant digital asset predictions possessing genuine worth.
vision.subdescription: Being the inaugural DarkPool forecasting system constructed on BNB Chain, DarkBet transforms digital currency market prediction by maintaining all forecasts entirely confidential until settlement. Participants can exchange cryptocurrency knowledge, forecast price changes, and engage in market occurrences that influence the destiny of digital currencies, all via blockchain openness and verifiable smart contracts.
vision.conclusion: We dream of building a system that combines confidentiality, creativity, and confidence, where each cryptocurrency forecast is not merely a bet, but an expression of shared market wisdom. DarkBet aims to enable people to make evidence-based digital asset choices, unite groups through common convictions about virtual currency prospects, and cultivate a fresh economy founded on honesty, responsibility, and distributed involvement in the cryptocurrency realm.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize prediction markets by introducing the first truly private, fair, and decentralized betting platform. We believe that prediction markets should be accessible to everyone while maintaining complete privacy and preventing manipulation.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your betting strategy remains completely hidden until market resolution.

fairness.title: Fair Competition
fairness.description: No first-mover advantage, no copy trading, no manipulation.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: All transactions are on-chain and verifiable.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: AI-powered resolution and dynamic AMM pricing.

step1.title: Global Prediction Markets
step1.description: Access to prediction markets for events worldwide, from sports to politics to weather.

step2.title: AI-Powered Insights
step2.description: Advanced AI analysis providing unbiased market insights and automated resolution.

step3.title: Decentralized Governance
step3.description: Community-driven decisions on platform features and market categories.

step4.title: Cross-Chain Integration
step4.description: Multi-chain support for broader accessibility and reduced transaction costs.

join.title: Join Our Vision
join.description: Be part of the future of prediction markets. Connect your wallet and start participating in the DarkPool revolution.

why_choose_darkbet.title: Why Choose DarkBet
why_choose_darkbet.description: In a universe where confidence and information are paramount, DarkBet unites both on the blockchain. The system enables participants to transform their viewpoints into quantifiable forecasts with complete openness and confidentiality via our groundbreaking Dark Pool mechanism.
why_choose_darkbet.built_on_bnb_desc: Utilizing the expandability and minimal transaction costs of BNB Chain, DarkBet guarantees rapid, economical, and protected market engagement for participants globally.
why_choose_darkbet.dark_pool_privacy_desc: Your wagering approach stays entirely concealed until market settlement, stopping interference and guaranteeing equitable competition for all members.
why_choose_darkbet.transparent_desc: Every forecast, result, and payment is documented on-chain, ensuring confidence and clarity throughout each transaction while preserving wagering confidentiality.
why_choose_darkbet.community_driven_desc: DarkBet enables participants to establish and participate in forecasting markets that mirror worldwide occurrences, patterns, and blockchain information with total privacy safeguards.
why_choose_darkbet.rewarding_accuracy_desc: Participants who forecast accurately are compensated directly from market funds, encouraging evidence-based, knowledgeable decision-making in an equitable setting.
why_choose_darkbet.ai_powered_desc: Sophisticated AI automatically settles forecasting markets utilizing real-world information from 25+ APIs, guaranteeing rapid and precise results.

conclusion.title: The DarkBet Benefit
conclusion.description: DarkBet provides you with the resources to engage confidently, understanding every forecast is equitable, protected, and confirmed on BNB Chain. Our Dark Pool mechanism ensures your tactics stay confidential while preserving complete openness in results and payments.

security.title: Protection & Confidentiality
security.description: DarkBet incorporates Privy, a reliable third-party authentication service, to guarantee the protection and confidentiality of all participants. Privy facilitates secure wallet links, encrypted session handling, and identity confirmation, assisting in safeguarding the community from deceptive behavior while preserving a smooth on-chain experience.
security.encrypted: Encrypted session handling and protected wallet connections
security.privacy: Complete wagering confidentiality with Dark Pool innovation

ready.title: Prepared to Begin?
ready.description: Become part of DarkBet today and encounter the tomorrow of forecasting markets with complete confidentiality and openness.

connect_wallet.title: Link Digital Wallet
connect_wallet.description: Prior to commencing crypto forecasting, you must establish your account. Here's how to register and link your digital wallet to DarkBet securely.

supported_wallets.title: Compatible Wallets
supported_wallets.description: DarkBet accommodates an extensive selection of popular digital currency wallets through our integration with Privy.

step1.title: Click Link Wallet
step1.description: Click the "Link Wallet" button in the top navigation bar of the DarkBet platform.

step2.title: Choose Your Wallet
step2.description: Select your preferred wallet from the list of compatible options. If you're using MetaMask, it will automatically link. For mobile wallets, scan the QR code with WalletConnect.

step3.title: Authorize Connection
step3.description: Authorize the connection request in your wallet. This enables DarkBet to interact with your wallet for transactions and balance verification.

step4.title: Begin Forecasting
step4.description: Once linked, you can start generating crypto predictions, placing wagers, and participating in DarkBet markets!

important.title: Critical Notes
important.note1: Ensure you're linked to the BNB Smart Chain network in your wallet.
important.note2: Maintain some BNB in your wallet for transaction fees.
important.note3: Never disclose your private keys or seed phrases to anyone.
important.note4: DarkBet will never request your private keys or seed phrases.

network.title: Incorrect Network
network.description: If you encounter a network error, ensure your wallet is linked to BNB Smart Chain (BSC). You can add BSC to your wallet using Chain ID: 56.

transaction.title: Transaction Failed
transaction.description: Ensure you have sufficient BNB for gas fees. Try increasing the gas limit if transactions are failing.

connection.title: Linking Issues
connection.description: Try refreshing the page and re-linking your wallet. Clear your browser cache if problems persist.

security.title: Protection & Confidentiality
security.description: DarkBet incorporates Privy, a reliable third-party authentication service, to guarantee the protection and confidentiality of all participants. Privy facilitates secure wallet links, encrypted session handling, and identity confirmation, assisting in safeguarding the community from deceptive behavior while preserving a smooth on-chain experience.

encrypted.title: Encrypted Sessions
encrypted.description: All wallet connections are encrypted and secure, protecting your private keys and session data.

verification.title: Identity Verification
verification.description: Advanced verification systems help protect against fraudulent activity and ensure community safety.

security.title: Security & Transparency
security.description: Security measures and transparency features of the DarkBet platform.

dark_pool.hidden_bets: Your betting strategy remains completely hidden until market resolution

dark_pool.encrypted_data: All betting data is encrypted and stored securely

note.title: Security Note
note.description: All API keys and sensitive data are masked - We never expose internal credentials, vault wallet addresses, or verification source endpoints to protect platform integrity.

on_chain.title: On-Chain Verification
on_chain.description: All transactions and outcomes are recorded on BNB Smart Chain and can be verified on BSCScan.

open_source.title: Open Source Components
open_source.description: Key components of the platform are open source, allowing for community verification and auditing.

audit_reports.title: Regular Audits
audit_reports.description: Smart contracts undergo regular security audits by third-party firms.

community.title: Community Oversight
community.description: Community members can report security issues and participate in platform governance.

phase_1.title: Phase 1: Foundation Launch
phase_1.description: Establish the core platform and ecosystem fundamentals.

launch.title: Official Launch of DarkBet on BNB Chain
launch.description: Launch the core DarkBet platform with Dark Pool betting capabilities on BNB Chain.

contracts.title: Smart Contract Deployment
contracts.description: Deploy smart contracts for on-chain prediction markets with Dark Pool privacy features.

privacy.title: Integration with Privy for Secure Authentication
privacy.description: Integrate Privy for secure wallet connection and identity verification with privacy protection.

prediction_types.title: Launch of Custom Bet and Price Oracle Prediction Types
prediction_types.description: Enable custom prediction creation and automated price oracle integration for various market types.

liquidity.title: Initial Liquidity Setup and DEX Listing
liquidity.description: Set up initial liquidity pools and prepare for DEX listing of DarkBet tokens.

community.title: Community Onboarding and Early Reward Campaigns
community.description: Launch community onboarding programs and early adopter reward campaigns to build initial user base.

focus.title: Phase 1 Focus
focus.description: This foundation phase establishes DarkBet as the first Dark Pool prediction market platform, focusing on core functionality, security, and initial community building. The emphasis is on creating a robust, privacy-focused betting experience that sets the stage for future growth.

phase_2.title: Phase 2: Expansion & Growth
phase_2.description: Strengthen community participation and introduce advanced features.

buyback.title: Implementation of Buyback & Burn Program
buyback.description: Launch token buyback and burn mechanisms to support long-term token stability and value growth.

leaderboard.title: Launch of Leaderboard System and Referral Rewards
leaderboard.description: Introduce competitive leaderboards and referral reward systems to incentivize community participation.

mobile.title: Rollout of Mobile-Friendly Interface
mobile.description: Launch mobile-optimized interface and performance improvements for better user experience.

oracles.title: Integration with Additional Oracles
oracles.description: Expand oracle integrations for sports, stocks, and real-world data sources.

marketing.title: Strategic Marketing Partnerships
marketing.description: Establish strategic marketing partnerships and community collaborations for platform growth.

token_integration.title: Token Integration for Direct Betting
token_integration.description: Develop integration of DarkBet tokens for direct betting within the platform.

focus.title: Phase 2 Focus
focus.description: This expansion phase focuses on growing the DarkBet community and ecosystem. We introduce advanced features, improve user experience, and establish strategic partnerships while maintaining the core Dark Pool privacy principles that make DarkBet unique.

phase_3.title: Phase 3: Ecosystem Development
phase_3.description: Build a sustainable, utility-driven token economy.

staking.title: Introduction of Staking System
staking.description: Launch staking system with yield rewards in DarkBet tokens for long-term holders.

creator_program.title: Launch of DarkBet Creator Program
creator_program.description: Introduce verified market creator program for high-quality prediction markets.

ai_analysis.title: AI-Based Prediction Analysis
ai_analysis.description: Launch AI-based prediction analysis for event outcomes and market insights.

mobile_app.title: Release of DarkBet Mobile App
mobile_app.description: Launch native mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.

cex_listing.title: CEX Listing and Cross-Chain Integration
cex_listing.description: Secure CEX listing for DarkBet tokens and develop cross-chain bridge integration.

focus.title: Phase 3 Focus
focus.description: This ecosystem development phase focuses on building a sustainable token economy around DarkBet. We introduce staking rewards, creator incentives, and expand platform accessibility while maintaining the privacy and security features that define our Dark Pool approach.

phase_4.title: Phase 4: Governance & Global Adoption
phase_4.description: Transition toward a community-governed and globally recognized platform.

dao.title: Launch of DarkBet DAO
dao.description: Implement full decentralized governance through DarkBet DAO for community-driven platform decisions.

data_providers.title: Integration with Major Data Providers
data_providers.description: Integrate with major data providers and analytics tools for enhanced prediction accuracy.

media_partnerships.title: Partnership with Media and Web3 Platforms
media_partnerships.description: Establish partnerships with media and Web3 platforms for verified prediction feeds.

global_marketing.title: Global Marketing and Sponsorship Campaigns
global_marketing.description: Launch comprehensive global marketing and sponsorship campaigns for worldwide adoption.

ecosystem_upgrades.title: Continuous Ecosystem Upgrades
ecosystem_upgrades.description: Implement continuous ecosystem upgrades and scalability improvements for global scale.

focus.title: Phase 4 Focus
focus.description: This final phase transforms DarkBet into a globally recognized, community-governed platform. We achieve full decentralization through DAO governance while establishing strategic partnerships and global presence, all while maintaining our core Dark Pool privacy and security principles.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.description: Token economics and distribution model for DarkBet.

marketing.title: Marketing & Collaboration
marketing.description: Dedicated to brand growth, partnerships, and promotional activities that strengthen DarkBet's global presence.

future_dev.title: Future Development
future_dev.description: Set aside for future features, cross-chain integrations, and long-term ecosystem expansion.

buyback_note.title: Buyback & Burn Program
buyback_note.description: All fees collected while DarkBet's market cap remains below 1M will be fully allocated to buyback and burn programs, supporting long-term token stability and value growth.

staking.title: Staking Rewards
staking.description: Stake DarkBet tokens to earn yield rewards and participate in platform governance.

betting.title: Direct Betting
betting.description: Use DarkBet tokens directly for placing bets in prediction markets.

governance.title: Governance Rights
governance.description: Participate in DAO governance to vote on platform features and ecosystem decisions.

rewards.title: Creator Rewards
rewards.description: Earn DarkBet tokens for creating successful prediction markets and contributing to the ecosystem.

polybets.title: Introducing Polybets
polybets.description: DarkBet just got smarter. We're excited to launch Polybets, a new feature that automatically mirrors trending prediction markets from Polymarket, bringing real-time insights and verified outcomes directly to the DarkBet ecosystem.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: DarkBet just got smarter. We're excited to launch Polybets, a new feature that automatically mirrors trending prediction markets from Polymarket, bringing real-time insights and verified outcomes directly to the DarkBet ecosystem.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.description: Polybets pulls the top 100 trending markets from Polymarket and keeps them live on DarkBet, with automatic syncing and resolution. No need to manually create or verify markets, everything updates automatically.

accumulating_library.title: Accumulating Library
accumulating_library.description: Polybets now works like a growing, self-updating library:
accumulating_library.point1: Every sync checks the top 100 trending markets from Polymarket.
accumulating_library.point2: New markets are added automatically to the DarkBet collection.
accumulating_library.point3: Old markets remain stored — even after they drop from the top 100.
accumulating_library.point4: Over time, DarkBet builds an ever-growing archive of on-chain prediction markets.

sync_interval.title: 30-Second Sync Interval
sync_interval.description: We've made PolyBets faster than ever:
sync_interval.point1: The system syncs every 30 seconds to capture new trending markets quickly.
sync_interval.point2: Resolutions from Polymarket are also synced in near real-time.
sync_interval.point3: Verified logs confirm that sync operations are consistently running every 30 seconds — ensuring smooth, up-to-date market data.

note.title: Important Note
note.description: Bets operate the same way as standard DarkBet markets, with no cancellations or refunds. All joined funds are secured in DarkBet's escrow, and the standard 1.5% platform fee applies.

automation.title: Automated Market Creation
automation.description: No need to manually create markets - trending predictions are automatically synced and available.

verified.title: Verified Outcomes
verified.description: All outcomes are verified through Polymarket's established resolution mechanisms.

privacy.title: Dark Pool Privacy
privacy.description: Your betting strategies remain private until market resolution, even in mirrored markets.

growing.title: Growing Archive
growing.description: Access to an ever-growing library of prediction markets from the past and present.

claiming_winnings.title: Claiming Your Winnings
claiming_winnings.description: How to claim your rewards after winning prediction markets.

payouts.title: How Payouts Work
payouts.winners_split: Winners split the total pool proportionally
payouts.formula: Payout = (Your Shares ÷ Total Winning Shares) × Total Pool
payouts.receive: You receive 98.5% of gross winnings in BNB

security.title: Security Features
security.vault_wallet: Secure vault wallet holds all funds
security.bscscan: View transaction on BSCScan after claiming

step1.title: Wait for Market Resolution
step1.description: Once the prediction market expires, our AI system automatically determines the outcome.

step2.title: Check Your Winning Bets
step2.description: Navigate to "My Bets" to see which of your predictions were correct.

step3.title: Click "Claim Winnings"
step3.description: Click the claim button next to your winning prediction to initiate the payout.

step4.title: Confirm Transaction
step4.description: Confirm the transaction in your wallet to receive your winnings in BNB.

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.gas_fees: You will need to pay gas fees for the claim transaction
notes.cooldown_period: There is a 30-second cooldown between claims to prevent duplicate transactions
notes.platform_fee: A 1.5% platform fee is automatically deducted from all winnings
notes.transaction_history: All transactions are recorded on-chain and can be viewed on BSCScan

ai_resolution.description: How our AI system automatically resolves crypto prediction market outcomes.

overview.title: Crypto-Focused Verification System
overview.description: When crypto bets expire, our multi-layer verification system automatically determines the outcome using advanced AI analysis and crypto-specific data sources.

layer1.title: Layer 1: Crypto Price Verification
layer1.description: Real-time cryptocurrency price data from multiple exchanges provides instant, verifiable results for crypto predictions.
layer1.crypto_prices: Real-time cryptocurrency price data from multiple exchanges
layer1.on_chain_data: On-chain transaction and block data verification
layer1.instant_resolution: Instant resolution for crypto price-based predictions

layer2.title: Layer 2: Crypto Data Gathering
layer2.description: Crypto-specific APIs fetch real data: price feeds, market data, and blockchain information for cryptocurrency predictions.

price_feeds.title: Price Feeds
price_feeds.description: Multiple cryptocurrency price feeds from major exchanges for accurate price verification.

market_data.title: Market Data
market_data.description: Real-time crypto market data including volume, market cap, and trading activity.

blockchain_data.title: Blockchain Data
blockchain_data.description: On-chain data verification from multiple blockchain networks for crypto-related predictions.

crypto_news.title: Crypto News
crypto_news.description: Cryptocurrency-specific news and announcements for market-moving events.

layer3.title: Layer 3: AI Analysis
layer3.description: Advanced AI analyzes gathered crypto evidence and makes final determination with reasoning.
layer3.data_analysis: Comprehensive analysis of all gathered crypto evidence
layer3.reasoning: Detailed reasoning provided for each crypto resolution decision
layer3.consensus: Consensus building from multiple crypto data sources

data_sources.title: Crypto Data Sources & APIs
data_sources.description: Our AI system integrates with 25+ crypto APIs and data sources to ensure accurate and comprehensive resolution.

step1.title: Crypto Market Expiration
step1.description: Crypto prediction market reaches its expiration time and closes for new bets.

step2.title: Crypto Data Collection (1-2 minutes)
step2.description: System gathers relevant crypto data from all configured APIs and sources.

step3.title: AI Analysis (2-3 minutes)
step3.description: AI processes the crypto data and determines the outcome with detailed reasoning.

step4.title: Resolution & Payouts
step4.description: Outcome is recorded on-chain and winners can claim their crypto payouts.

transparency.title: Transparency & Verification
transparency.description: All crypto resolution decisions are recorded on-chain with detailed reasoning. Users can verify the crypto data sources used and the AI's decision-making process for complete transparency.

dynamic_pricing.title: Dynamic Market Pricing (AMM)
dynamic_pricing.description: Understanding how our Automated Market Maker pricing system works.

how_prices.title: How Prices Work
how_prices.description: DarkBet uses a Fixed Product Market Maker (FPMM) for fair, dynamic pricing.
how_prices.ratios: Prices determined by pool balance ratios
how_prices.sum: YES price + NO price = 0.01 BNB always
how_prices.market_shift: More bets on one side = higher price for that outcome
how_prices.slight_shift: Each bet shifts the market slightly

default.title: Default: Market Price
default.description: Buy 1 share at current market price - quick and simple betting.

custom.title: Custom: Amount-Based
custom.description: Enter any BNB amount, get calculated shares based on current market price.

example.title: Example Calculation
example.description: If YES is trading at 0.006 BNB and you bet 0.01 BNB:

price_impact.title: Price Impact
price_impact.description: Larger bets have more price impact, creating natural market dynamics and preventing manipulation.

liquidity.title: Liquidity Provision
liquidity.description: All participants contribute to market liquidity, ensuring continuous trading availability.

fairness.title: Fair Pricing
fairness.description: Algorithmic pricing ensures fair market value based on supply and demand.

arbitrage.title: Arbitrage Opportunities
arbitrage.description: Price imbalances create opportunities for market efficiency and fair value discovery.

bullish.title: Bullish Market (More YES bets)
bullish.description: YES price increases, NO price decreases - reflecting market sentiment.

bearish.title: Bearish Market (More NO bets)
bearish.description: NO price increases, YES price decreases - indicating negative sentiment.

balanced.title: Balanced Market
balanced.description: Equal betting on both sides results in balanced pricing around 0.005 BNB each.

advantages.title: Advantages of AMM Pricing
advantages.fairness: Fair, algorithmic pricing based on market supply and demand
advantages.liquidity: Continuous liquidity provision from all participants
advantages.manipulation: Resistant to manipulation due to algorithmic pricing
advantages.transparency: Transparent pricing mechanism visible to all users
advantages.efficiency: Efficient price discovery through market dynamics

creating_predictions.title: Generating Crypto Forecasts
creating_predictions.description: Step-by-step guide to generating crypto prediction markets on DarkBet.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Transforming your crypto market insight into a prediction market has never been simpler. Follow these steps to generate a transparent, on-chain crypto forecast using DarkBet's DarkPool technology.

step1.title: STEP 1 - Describe Your Crypto Forecast
step1.description: Simply describe what crypto price movement you want to predict - AI will handle the rest.

example.title: Example Descriptions
example.bitcoin: "Will Bitcoin reach $100,000 by the end of 2024?"

step2.title: STEP 2 - AI Generates Smart Title
step2.description: Our AI analyzes your crypto description and creates a clear, searchable title optimized for the platform.

step3.title: STEP 3 - Automatic Deadline & Category
step3.description: AI suggests intelligent deadlines (market close times for crypto) and assigns the cryptocurrency category.

deadline.title: Smart Deadlines
deadline.crypto: Crypto: End of day, week, or specified date
deadline.daily: Daily: Market close or specific time

privacy.title: DarkPool Confidentiality
privacy.description: Your crypto prediction remains private until resolution, preventing copy trading and manipulation.

ai_resolution.title: AI-Enabled Resolution
ai_resolution.description: Automatic resolution using real-world crypto data from 25+ APIs and AI analysis.

dynamic_pricing.title: Dynamic Pricing
dynamic_pricing.description: Fair market-based pricing using Automated Market Maker (AMM) technology for crypto predictions.

global.title: Global Access
global.description: Create crypto predictions on digital asset events worldwide with multi-language support.

best_practices.title: Best Practices for Creating Crypto Predictions
best_practices.clear: Be clear and specific in your crypto description
best_practices.verifiable: Ensure the crypto outcome can be objectively verified
best_practices.timeframe: Include clear timeframes when relevant for crypto markets
best_practices.interesting: Create crypto predictions that others will find interesting to bet on

ready.title: Ready to Generate Your First Crypto Forecast?
ready.description: Now that you understand how to generate crypto predictions, you're ready to start building your own crypto prediction markets on DarkBet.

final_words.title: Final Words
final_words.intro: DarkBet stands at the intersection of innovation, transparency, and community-driven finance.
final_words.mission: As the first dark pool prediction market built on BNB Chain, our mission goes beyond simple forecasting, we aim to reshape how people interact with information, markets, and each other in the decentralized world.
final_words.transformation: By empowering users to create and participate in transparent, verifiable prediction markets, DarkBet transforms insight into opportunity. Every prediction, every trade, and every outcome contributes to a smarter, fairer, and more connected ecosystem.
final_words.journey: The journey of DarkBet is only beginning. With continuous development, strategic partnerships, and a growing community, we are committed to building a platform that represents the future of prediction — where foresight becomes value, and every voice shapes the market.
